title: sever is getting slow
author: phb2996690320
txt_content:
TIM图片20191214225346.png (3.35 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2019-12-14 22:54 上传





我很好奇出现这个到底是什么原因
是个新端
我看了一下论坛内的情况
听说是服务器商太坑人了
内存性能不足 是吗？
我希望有能懂的人来说
这样也能为之后的人来提供帮助

replies.author: Redstone_ray
replies.txt_content: I don't think you would consider this as "Slow", anything above 18.5 is fine, I would suggest switch to paper, use G1GC Aikar start up flag and maybe EntityTrackerFixer plugin? (If timings support that is the probelm)

replies.author: phb2996690320
replies.txt_content:
Redstone_ray 发表于 2019-12-15 02:42
I don't think you would consider this as "Slow", anything above 18.5 is fine, I would suggest switch ...
NO，my server version is 1.7.10 Uranium

replies.author: 史丹安
replies.txt_content: 这个问题我之前开服遇到过 是因为装了多世界插件后 world这个世界是默认Unload的 而你默认进入了world主世界 所以出这个问题， 我是直接mv create world normal 后加载了world解决了问题

replies.author: phb2996690320
replies.txt_content:
史丹安 发表于 2019-12-15 19:55
这个问题我之前开服遇到过 是因为装了多世界插件后 world这个世界是默认Unload的 而你默认进入了world主世 ...
并不行O 因为提示 MV不并允许创建已存在的世界叫world
